title: Clients can see trading history and edit accounts.
keywords: Account settings; trading history; deposit; account details.

content-body.text: Deposit funds, see trading history and edit your account details.

msgBox.maxlength: First Name must include a maximum of 30 letters.
msgBox.minlength: First Name must include at least 2 letters.

msgBox.maxlength: Last Name must include a maximum of 30 letters.
msgBox.minlength: Last Name must include at least 2 letters.

msgBox.pattern: Please insert a valid email address.

msgBox.minlength: Password must include at least 6 characters.

content-body.text: If you wish to change a blocked field of "Personal Details", please, contact our customer support team.
